column1: Highlights: Dual Band Wi-Fi 6: Speeds up to 5400 Mbps—4804 Mbps on 5 GHz and 574 Mbps on 2.4 GHz.*
Boosted Seamless Coverage: Achieve seamless whole home coverage with a clearer and stronger WiFi signal.
One Unified Network: Multiple units form a whole-home network that auto-selects the best connection as you move around your home.**
Full Gigabit Ports: 2 Gigabit Ethernet ports ensure stable and fast wired connections and strong Ethernet backhaul.

column3: and Parental Controls provide personalized and safer online experience.†

column1: EasyMesh Compatible: Provides whole home WiFi coverage with standard mesh technology.
Easy Setup: Set up your mesh WiFi in minutes with intuitive Aginet app.
Content Notes: *Maximum wireless signal rates are the physical rates derived from IEEE Standard 802.11 specifications. Actual wireless data throughput and wireless coverage
column2: and quantity of connected devices are not guaranteed and will vary as a result of network conditions

column1: **Some features will require two or more units.

column7: and WPA3 requires clients to also support the corresponding features. The 160 MHz bandwidth may be unavailable in the 5 GHz band in some regions/countries due to regulatory restrictions.

column1: ‡Seamless roaming/No-Drop WiFi refers to the WiFi roaming that supports IEEE 802.11 k/v/r protocol
column2: helping connected devices search and shift from one AP to another within 0.3 seconds. Clients need to support 802.11 k/v/r and may require additional setup. Performance may vary depending on the client device.
